channel.title: Data Projects Portfolio on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Data Projects Portfolio on Home

item.title: Cluster Analysis: Policies and demographics
item.description: The aim of this project was determine the attitudes of university students in response to the Government’s implementations of Covid-19 restrictions and rules. In this study we collected data from a survey that me and my peers had shared amongst the university’s 1000+ student body Utilizing tools such as R Studio and Excel and methods including factor and clustering analysis to define the various groups from our survey. The result of our analysis lead us to define 2 main groups ‘Health conscious’ and “Risk takers”.

item.title: Web Scraping: Getting a bargain
item.description: In this project the aim was to build a price tracker to create a spreadsheet which collects variations in price over time in order to both prices of an item a user wishes to purchase. In this example Python alongside the BeautifulSoup and Pandas packages were used in order to scrape the data from a selected webstore to then aggregate it into an Excel file. Link to Github
